pr_title: DHFPROD-6117:Function picker dropdown should be sorted in alphabetical order

timeline.bodyText: @srinathgit @xnikhil08 How easily can this return an array instead of an object? An array seems expected here and also addresses @ryanjdew 's concern about the order of keys not being guaranteed.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: The endpoint now returns an array.
replies.author: srinathgit
